ds_samp_desc: #Patient Identifier	Sample Identifier	SPECIMEN_ID	CANCER_TYPE	CANCER_TYPE_DETAILED	TUMOR_TISSUE_SITE	TUMOR_TYPE	SAMPLE_TYPE	MATCHED_NORMAL_SAMPLE_ID	MATCHED_NORMAL_SPECIMEN_ID	CBTTC_PAIRED_IDS

#Patient identifier	Sample Identifier using external_sample_id	kfdrc tumor biopsecimen ID	Study-defined cancer type	Study-defined cancer type detail	tumor tissue location	primary v metastatic tumor designation	patient tissue sample or cell line	matched normal external_sample_id	kfdrc matched normal biospecimen ID	Original CBTTC DNA/RNA pair ids, where applicable
#STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING
PATIENT_ID	SAMPLE_ID	SPECIMEN_ID	CANCER_TYPE	CANCER_TYPE_DETAILED	TUMOR_TISSUE_SITE	TUMOR_TYPE	SAMPLE_TYPE	MATCHED_NORMAL_SAMPLE_ID	MATCHED_NORMAL_SPECIMEN_ID	CBTTC_PAIRED_IDS
ds_pt_desc: #Patient Identifier	External Patient Identifier	GENDER	AGE	TUMOR_SITE	RACE	ETHNICITY	OS_STATUS	OS_MONTHS

#Patient identifier	Patient ID used by generator of data	Gender or sex of the patient	Age at which the condition or disease was first diagnosed, in years	Tumor location	racial demographic	ethnic demographic	Overall patient survival status	Overall survival in months since initial diagnosis
#STRING	STRING	STRING	NUMBER	STRING	STRING	STRING	STRING	NUMBER
PATIENT_ID	EXTERNAL_PATIENT_ID	GENDER	AGE	TUMOR_SITE	RACE	ETHNICITY	OS_STATUS	OS_MONTHS

meta_attr.profile_description: Fusion data, from openPBTA using arriba and STAR Fusion, annotated and filtered using annoFuse
Expression levels from RNA-Seq, Z scores of log2(FPKM + 1) values
Predicted copy number values from WGS (Continuous). Copy number calls obtained using ControlFreeC, filtering calls smaller than 50KB
Predicted copy number values from WGS (Discrete). Values: -2 = homozygous deletion; -1 = hemizygous deletion; 0 = neutral / no change; 1 = gain; 2 = high level amplification
Consensus calls from strelka2, mutect2, lancet, and VarDict Java.  Two or more callers required to pass
